訴.definition: to complain; to sue; to tell

訴冤.definition: to complain; to vent one's grievances

訴求.definition: to demand; to call for; to petition; demand; wish; request; to promote one's brand; to appeal to (consumers); (marketing) message; pitch

訴說.definition: to recount; to tell of; to relate; (fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)

訴諸.definition: to appeal (to reason, sentiment, charity etc); to resort to (a course of action)
